file_content.text: This is insane! My men are working triple overtime, and we're still falling behind!
Work faster.
That's not--! Look, we both know Veedrig's skimming off the top. If this keeps up, we'll never finish the ark!
You got a big mouth, Tiero. Maybe I'll shut it for you.
Put that blaster down now, or this man's conscience will be the least of your concerns.
That's enough!
Be aware, friend: No being is unarmed when others will stand up for him.
A very unwise threat.
Fair warning: If you don't stand down in the next three seconds, you'll be spitting teeth.
Back off, right now.
The only thing I hate worse than a bully is a bully with no class. Back off, ugly.
Pick on someone else.
Why are you threatening this man?
What's going on?
Wait. You--you're the ones Toborro's yelling about!
Give me a hand here. They're worth a fortune dead!
[Remain silent]
Toborro can find a new foreman tomorrow. One who doesn't make trouble.
Hey. I know you--Toborro's offering a fortune to anyone who gets you dead!
Wait. You--you're who Toborro's yelling about!
Give me a hand here. She's worth a fortune dead!
Give me a hand here. He's worth a fortune dead!
